Sentences: Ah go meet she by de junction tomorrow evening.
He does cook every Sunday like clockwork.
We was waitin whole day an still she eh show up.
Dey go be gone by de time yuh reach.
She wouldn'ta gone if she did know he dey.
The work get finish late last night.
He not comin because he feelin sick.
Yuh had tuh clean de house before Mammy come.
Ah coulda help yuh if yuh did ask.
De cake was bake by Granny heself.

—Where yuh was whole day?
—Doh start, ah went by Tantie house!

—Aye, yuh see meh charger?
—Check by de couch, it might be dey.

—How yuh feelin now?
—Better, but meh head still hurtin a lil bit.

—Ah hungry oui.
—Leh we stop by de doubles man.

—Dey movin real suspicious, ent?
—Yeah, someting feel off.

—Yuh done study for de test?
—Meh book open, but ah wasn’t studyin.

—Wait, yuh serious?
—Of course! Why ah go lie ’bout dat?

—Mammy go vex bad!
—Better you tell she now dan later.

—You hear de news?
—Nah, wha happen now?

—We limin Friday?
—Only if ah get pay before Thursday.
Ah go link allyuh later, mi gente.
Dey always want tuh talk 'bout vibes but never 'bout progrès.
He say, 'je ne sais pas', like dat go change de fact he wrong.
Mama say, 'ay bendito', when she hear how much de price raise.
Dat event was real bacchanal, pero me encantó.
She always say, 'una sonrisa puede cambiar todo', an she right too.
Wha allyuh tink 'bout dis fête? Porque yo estoy emocionado!
De shopkeeper bawl, '¡vete ya!', when he ketch dem tiefin.
It have plenty drama oui, mais c’est la vie.
Ah tired oui, pero la vida sigue adelante.

Sentences: Kindly contact our support desk for further assistance.
Who cyah hear go feel.
All skin teeth eh laugh.
Monkey know what tree tuh climb.
Ah throw stone an dog bark.
Donkey does work, horse does get pay.
Dey boil yuh corn.
Too much o’ one ting good fuh nuttin.
If crapaud jump on yuh foot, yuh go jump too.
Cockroach have no right in fowl party.
All fruit ripe doh mean yuh hadda pick all.

—What time de bus coming?
—It supposed tuh reach for 7:15.

—Who win de match last night?
—Soca Warriors mash up de game, boy!

—Where yuh put meh key?
—Check de kitchen counter.

—Why she bawlin so?
—She phone fall an mash up flat.

—When de concert starting?
—Doors open 6:30, show start 8 sharp.

—Is he working tomorrow?
—Nah, he take a day off.

—How yuh know she dey?
—Ah see she bag on de chair.

—What de hell goin on here?
—We just settin up, relax nah.

—Can yuh help meh move this?
—Yeah, gimme a lil five minutes.

—Yuh see de thing?
—Yeah, but ah couldn’t reach it.
Put down dat bottle before yuh break it!
Tell she tuh come downstairs now.
Hold on tuh de railing when yuh climbing.
Don’t touch dat pot—de oil still hot!
Fetch two bag o’ ice from de parlour.
Leh we go now before traffic build up.
Keep quiet an listen tuh wha ah sayin.
Take yuh shoes off by de door.
Bring de car keys tuh meh, quick quick.
Watch de baby while ah bathe.
